content.en: Algorithmic Vaccine Safety: Researchers have investigated various questions related to vaccine safety using algorithms. For example, they found that litigation-related reports have influenced the trends in adverse event reports to the Vaccine Adverse Event Reporting System (VAERS). Algorithms were also used to identify health outcomes of interest for evaluation in the Post-Licensure Rapid Immunization Safety Monitoring Program (PRISM) and to detect safety signals for febrile seizures after a seasonal influenza virus vaccine. These findings highlight the important role algorithms play in monitoring and evaluating vaccine safety.
content.da: Algoritmisk Vaccinesikkerhed: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige spørgsmål relateret til vaccinesikkerhed ved hjælp af algoritmer. For eksempel fandt de, at rapporter relateret til retssager har påvirket tendenserne i rapporter om bivirkninger til Vaccine Adverse Event Reporting System (VAERS). Algoritmer blev også brugt til at identificere sundhedsresultater af interesse til evaluering i Post-Licensure Rapid Immunization Safety Monitoring Program (PRISM) og til at opdage sikkerhedssignaler for feberkramper efter en sæsoninfluenza-vaccine. Disse fund fremhæver den vigtige rolle, som algoritmer spiller i overvågning og evaluering af vaccinesikkerhed.
